name: CircleCI Monitor
description: Monitor your branches' build status on CircleCI
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:8000 https://localhost:8000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:8000 https://localhost:8000 https://circleci.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
